title: The Helipad Edition
description:
Amazon’s new headquarters, mayhem with Brexit, and Steve Cohen getting more billions on this week's episode with Felix Salmon, Anna Szymanski, and Emily Peck.
In the Slate Plus segment, Felix, Anna, and Emily discuss wealthy Californians hiring private firefighters.
Email: slatemoney@slate.comTwitter:@felixsalmon, @Three_Guineas, @EmilyRPeck
Production by Max Jacobs.
Listen to Slate Money via Apple Podcasts, Overcast, Spotify, Stitcher, or Google Play.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
